# ar_data_provider_state_running

**Enumeration Case**

The data provider is running.

## Declaration

```swift
ar_data_provider_state_running
```

## Getting the status of a data provider

- **ar_data_provider_state_initialized**: The data provider has been created.
- **ar_data_provider_state_stopped**: The data provider is stopped.
- **ar_data_provider_state_paused**: The data provider is paused.

items.description: The data provider has been created.
items.name: ar_data_provider_state_initialized
